name: Warehouse Fright
description:
As a security guard in a warehouse, you must eliminate all the ghosts haunting it by shining your flashlight at them, while avoiding the possessed objects thrown at you.

This was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 4. It is a game that emulates the feel of an NES title, inspired mainly by Donkey Kong (1981).

Controls:

Left and Right arrows: Walk.

Up and Down arrows: Use ladders.

X: Jump. You can't change direction while in mid-air.

Z: Shine light to defeat the ghost in each stage and to destroy its projectiles.

Credits:

Game made by: Eduardo Kumagai

Pixel NES font made by: Neale Davidson

https://fonts2u.com/pixel-nes.font

Music and Sound Effects made with: Bosca Ceoil

https://boscaceoil.net/
